'''Marshall Townend''' is the director of the play ''[[Boxing Day]]'' at the Lucille Lortel Theatre, which stars [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] and [[Kate Miller|Kate]]. He is very abrasive and dismissive of others.

Marshall and Kate were dating, but he dumped her after she was criticized in the play.


==Trivia==
After the end of Joey's play, Marshall gets very upset and tells the rest of them to "stuff their mouth with his mother's crab cakes", which may seem that his mother takes care of him.
